skills.name: Runic Blade
skills.blurb: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Riven''' gains a ''Charge'' for 6 seconds every time she uses an [[champion ability|ability]], stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on subsequent ability casts. '''Riven's''' [[basic attack]]s consume a ''Charge'' to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|30 to 60 for 6|1;6 to 18|formula=30%+6% at level 6, then+6% every 3 levels}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
The bonus damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Riven gains a Charge for 6 seconds every time she uses an champion ability, stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on subsequent ability casts. Riven's basic attacks consume a Charge to deal 1;6 to 18 â€’ undefined AD bonus physical damage.
The bonus damage is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
skills.notes:
* ''Runic Blade's'' duration refreshes whenever '''Riven''' gains or consumes a stack.
* ''Runic Blade'' charges are not consumed when attacking structures and {{tip|ward|wards}} and the extra damage is not applied.

skills.name: Broken Wings
skills.effect_radius: {{tt|{{fd|150}}|Standard first cast's radius}} / {{tt|250|Standard final cast's radius}} / {{tt|{{fd|200}}|Enhanced first cast's radius}} / {{tt|300|Enhanced final cast's radius}}
skills.blurb: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
description: '''Riven''' can activate ''Broken Wings'' three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a {{fd|0.3125}}-second {{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}} between casts. If '''Riven''' does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, the ability goes on cooldown.

Each of the three casts has '''Riven''' slash with her sword, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck, {{tip|Basic attack reset|resetting}} her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of ''Broken Wings'' if there are any.

{{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, affecting all enemies around the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.
{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Riven''' mimics the first cast's effects.

{{sbc|Third Cast:}} '''Riven''' mimics the first cast's effects in an expanded radius while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all affected enemies 75 units over {{fd|0.75}} seconds. This cast can cross terrain.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Riven can activate Broken Wings three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 0.3125-second static cooldown between casts. If Riven does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, the ability goes on cooldown.
Each of the three casts has Riven slash with her sword, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck, resetting her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of Broken Wings if there are any.
First Cast: Riven dashes up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, affecting all enemies around the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.
Second Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects.
Third Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects in an expanded radius while also knocking back all affected enemies 75 units over 0.75 seconds. This cast can cross terrain.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 95}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45 to 65}}% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|15*3 to 95*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45*3 to 65*3}}% AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Each cast counts as a single ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* If ''Broken Wings'' was cast at a target, '''Riven''' will attempt to [[basic attack]] the target afterwards.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

skills.name: Ki Burst
skills.blurb: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' causes her sword to emit a burst of runic energy around her before the cast time, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Riven causes her sword to emit a burst of runic energy around her before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
skills.notes:
* The damage and stun of ''Ki Burst'' will occur immediately at the start of cast.
* '''Riven''' is briefly unable to basic attack after the cast time.

skills.name: Valor
skills.blurb: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, though not through terrain, while {{tip|shield|shielding}} herself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and {{ai|Q|Riven}} may be cast during {{ai|W|Riven}} or {{ai|R|Riven}} cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.''{{bug|1}}
''Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Riven dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.
Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and Riven's Q may be cast during Riven's W or Riven's R cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.Unknown value: bug / 1
Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

skills.name: Blade of the Exile
skills.blurb: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' mends her broken blade and empowers it for 15 seconds, gaining {{as|20% AD}} {{sti|attack damage|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}, {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' attack range}}, and increased range on {{ai|Broken Wings|Riven}} and {{ai|Ki Burst|Riven}} for the duration. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, she gains the ability to cast {{ai|Wind Slash|Riven}} once for the duration.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Riven mends her broken blade and empowers it for 15 seconds, gaining 20% AD bonus attack damage, 75 bonus attack range, and increased range on Riven's Broken Wings and Riven's Ki Burst for the duration. After 0.5 seconds, she gains the ability to cast Riven's Wind Slash once for the duration.
skills.notes:
* The {{as|'''bonus''' AD}} is gained and determined on cast.
* All bonuses are gained after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the ability being cast.

skills.name: Wind Slash
skills.angle: {{tt|18{{degree}}|Right and left missiles at 9Â° to their side, respectively}}
skills.blurb: Riven unleashes a powerful ranged attack, which she may do once during Blade of the Exile.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' unleashes a wave of energy via three missiles spread in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} once to all enemies they pass through, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 200 for 9|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=2.667% per 1% missing health. ''This is capped at 200% bonus damage at 75% missing health.''}}|health}}.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Riven unleashes a wave of energy via three missiles spread in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage once to all enemies they pass through, increased by 0 to 75 â€’ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 200*3}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Wind Slash'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Wind Slash'' will fire from wherever '''Riven''' is at the end of the cast time.
* If ''Wind Slash'' hits an enemy while ''Riven'' is not visible, it will briefly grant {{tip|sight}} of the area around her to enemies.<!--Radius? Perception bubble duration? Same as the 'upon targeting/attacking from Bush or Fog' one?-->
* Each enemy can only be damaged by one missile.<!--Marker buff duration?-->

effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Physical Damage: (+ 180% bonus AD)
